message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking for a deal, Bob, but I've already let it go a bit lower than my initial price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $92.50
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $97.50. I'm willing to make one more concession to $97.50. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $92.50
